meanings.definition: A check issued to an employee in payment for work done.
meanings.sent1: I received my paycheck on Friday for working at the store.
meanings.sent2: She eagerly opened the envelope to see her paycheck inside.
meanings.sent3: After a long week, the paycheck felt like a reward for my hard work.
meanings.sent4: Her paycheck was a tangible symbol of her dedication to her job.
meanings.sent5: The paycheck was a welcome sight, bringing a sense of accomplishment.

meanings.definition: To give money in exchange for goods or services.
meanings.sent1: I will paycheck the mechanic for fixing my car.
meanings.sent2: They will paycheck the landlord for rent at the end of the month.
meanings.sent3: I paychecked the cashier for the groceries with a smile.
meanings.sent4: She paychecked the vendor for the fresh produce at the market.
meanings.sent5: The customer will paycheck the waiter for the delicious meal.
